TextView.android:text: Preventive Maintenance Schedule : MONTHLY \n ASMGCS RU type-5
Battery Voltage Before S/W off Main
Battery Current Before S/W off Main
Batt. Voltage After S/w off main
Batt. Current After S/w off main
Visually inspect the component of the lightning arrestors for any physical Damage.
1. Inspect antenna RF cables of all RUs and Reftrans and check for any loose connection.
2. Check the performance of UPS batteries by switching off the mains power supply and running the equipment on UPS. Record the back up time of UPS batteries at each site.
